00024 
00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_GENERICSERIALMANIPULATOR_
00026 #define _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_GENERICSERIALMANIPULATOR_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/control/ikor/ikor>
00029 #include <robot/SerialManipulator>
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Object>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace robot {
00035 namespace control {
00036 namespace ikor {
00037 
00038 /**
00039  * concrete class description of a serial manipulator
00040  *  (describable via Denavit-Hartenberg parameters) for use with IKOR
00041  */
00042 class GenericSerialManipulator : public robot::SerialManipulator
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   GenericSerialManipulator() : name("UNKNOWN"), joints(robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters(0)) {}
00046   GenericSerialManipulator(const String s) : name( s ), joints(robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters(0)) {}
00047   GenericSerialManipulator(const String s, const Int nj) : name( s ), joints(robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters(nj)) {}
00048   GenericSerialManipulator(const GenericSerialManipulator& r) {}
00049 
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("GenericSerialManipulator"); }
00051   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj GenericSerialManipulator(*this); }
00052 
00053   virtual String getName() const { return name; }
00054   virtual Int getNumberOfJoints() const { return joints.size(); }
00055 
00056   const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& getParameters() const;     ///< returns all of manipulator's joint parameters
00057   const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters getJoint(Int i) const; ///< returns D-H joint parameters for manipulator's ith joint (first joint = 1)
00058 
00059   void setParameters(const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& p);              ///< sets all of manipulator's joint D-H parameters
00060   void setJoint(const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j, const Int i); ///< sets D-H joint parameters for manipulator's ith joint (first joint = 1)
00061 
00062   virtual Matrix4 getBaseTransform() const { Matrix4 I; I.setIdentity(); return I; }
00063 
00064 private:
00065   String name;
00066   robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters joints;
00067 };
00068 
00069 } // namespace ikor
00070 } // namespace control
00071 } // namespace robot
00072 
00073 #endif
